<title>『舞いあがれ!』特集in大阪 ▽ゲスト 福原遥 高橋克典 - 土曜スタジオパーク - NHK</title><meta data-n-head="ssr" charset="utf-8"><meta data-n-head="ssr" name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="description" name="description" content="ドラマ舞台の東大阪から公開生放送。福原遥さん登場シーンの先出しやメイキング映像を交え、撮影裏話や今後の展開など見どころを伺います。中継では、もう一つの舞台、長崎・五島列島から、ヒロインが元気づけられた「ばらもん凧（だこ）」が舞いあがる姿を、共演者の長濱ねるさんが現地リポート！　舞台裏を明かすのは、共演者の永作博美さん、赤楚衛二さん。福原遥さんの秘蔵映像を公開！懐かしいお友達「まいんちゃん」"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="author" name="author" content="日本放送協会"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:type" property="og:type" content="video.episode"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:site_name" property="og:site_name" content="『舞いあがれ!』特集in大阪 ▽ゲスト 福原遥 高橋克典"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:title" property="og:title" content="『舞いあがれ!』特集in大阪 ▽ゲスト 福原遥 高橋克典 - 土曜スタジオパーク"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:description" property="og:description" content="ドラマ舞台の東大阪から公開生放送。福原遥さん登場シーンの先出しやメイキング映像を交え、撮影裏話や今後の展開など見どころを伺います。中継では、もう一つの舞台、長崎・五島列島から、ヒロインが元気づけられた「ばらもん凧（だこ）」が舞いあがる姿を、共演者の長濱ねるさんが現地リポート！　舞台裏を明かすのは、共演者の永作博美さん、赤楚衛二さん。福原遥さんの秘蔵映像を公開！懐かしいお友達「まいんちゃん」"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:url" property="og:url" content="https://www.nhk.jp/p/dosta/ts/X5LYVNKNKL/episode/te/5GL899M5LZ/?cid=nol"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="og:image" property="og:image" content="https://www.nhk.or.jp/pr-image/9b2a2a2c6338f46bc86529c7a1f64790_ll.jpg"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="fb:app_id" property="fb:app_id" name="fb:app_id" content="1480146385671692"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="twitter:site" property="twitter:site" name="twitter:site" content="@nhk"><meta data-n-head="ssr" data-hid="twitter:card" property="twitter:card" name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image"><base href="/"><link data-n-head="ssr" rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/favicon.ico"><link data-n-head="ssr" rel="canonical" href="https://www.nhk.jp/p/dosta/ts/X5LYVNKNKL/episode/te/5GL899M5LZ/"><style data-n-head="ssr" type="text/css">.headline.atom { --headline-text-light: #DF7072; --headline-text-dark: #FF8082; } .headline-component {color: #DF7072}
      .gc-section-title.heading { --section-title-text-light: #DF7072; --section-title-text-dark: #FF8082; } .headline-component {color: #DF7072}
      #seriesTabBar { --tab-bg-color-light: #DF7072; --tab-bg-color-dark: #FF8082; } .tab-bar .tab-button:hover, .tab-bar .tab-button.is-active {color: #DF7072} .tab-bar ul::after {background: #DF7072}
      .info-segment.event-date, .event-body .event-details-panel { --event-color-light: #DF7072; --event-color-dark: #FF8082; } .event-date.rescheduled::after, .event-date.movedOnline::after, .event-details-panel.rescheduled::after, .event-details-panel.movedOnline::after {color: #DF7072; border: 1px solid #DF7072;}
      .gc-title-of-area, .gc-title-of-area-heading {--color-code: #DF7072!important; color: #DF7072!important;}
      @media screen and (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { .gc-title-of-area, .gc-title-of-area-heading {--color-code: #FF8082!important; color: #FF8082!important;} }
      .ingredient-head-recipetitle {--color-code: #DF7072!important; color: #DF7072!important;}
      @media screen and (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { .ingredient-head-recipetitle {--color-code: #FF8082!important; color: #FF8082!important;} }
      .g-howto-section-title {--color-code: #DF7072!important; color: #DF7072!important;}
      @media screen and (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { .g-howto-section-title {--color-code: #FF8082!important; color: #FF8082!important;} }
      .gc-toc-name {--color-code: #DF7072!important; color: #DF7072!important;}
      @media screen and (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { .gc-toc-name {--color-code: #FF8082!important; color: #FF8082!important;} }
      .list-title .name {--color-code: #DF7072!important; color: #DF7072!important;}
      @media screen and (prefers-color-scheme: dark) { .list-title .name {--color-code: #FF8082!important; color: #FF8082!important;} }

var(--border-color)!important}.nr-common-global-menu-other-item:first-child{border-top:none!important}.nr-common-footer-logo{background-image:url(/p/static/assets/img/logo_nhk_type_white.9a999f9.svg)!important}.nr-common-footer-item a,.nr-common-footer-item a:link,.nr-common-footer-item a:visited{color:#fff!important}}@media screen and (max-width:979px){:root{--body-width:100vw}.grid-contents{width:100%;margin:0 auto}}@media print{body{width:1280px;zoom:.8}.series-page .base-header-bg,.series-page .base-header-bg-blur,.series-page img{background:none;background-size:0}.series-page .base-header-bg-blur:after,.series-page .base-header-bg:after,.series-page img:after{position:absolute;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:#fff}.series-page .base-image{position:relative}.series-page .base-image:before{content:"";position:absolute;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:1;background:#fafafa}.main-content.has-modal .timetable-page{height:100vh;overflow:hidden}}
a,abbr,acronym,address,applet,article,aside,audio,b,big,blockquote,body,canvas,caption,center,cite,code,dd,del,details,dfn,div,dl,dt,em,embed,fieldset,figcaption,figure,footer,form,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,header,hgroup,html,i,iframe,img,ins,kbd,label,legend,li,mark,menu,nav,object,ol,output,p,pre,q,ruby,s,samp,section,small,span,strike,strong,sub,summary,sup,table,tbody,td,tfoot,th,thead,time,tr,tt,u,ul,var,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,section{display:block}body{line-height:1}ol,ul{list-style:none}blockquote,q{quotes:none}blockquote:after,blockquote:before,q:after,q:before{content:"";content:none}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}body,html{color:var(--text-color);font-size:62.5%;margin:0;padding:0;background:var(--bg-color)}*{box-sizing:border-box;font-feature-settings:"palt"}a{text-decoration:none}.main-content{width:100%}.main-content,.main-content-wrapper{background:#fafafa;background:var(--bg-color)}.main-content-wrapper{position:relative;padding-top:56px}.hide{display:none}@media screen and (max-width:979px){.main-content-wrapper{padding-top:44px}}@font-face{font-family:Meiryo;src:local("Meiryo")}body,html{font-family:Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro,Hiragino Sans,Meiryo,sans-serif}
.hidden{display:none!important}.main-content{width:100%;background:#fff}.global-menu-lightbox{margin-top:56px}#header-position{width:100%;background:#fafafa;position:relative}#header-position #common-header{z-index:501}#header-position #common-header .nr-common-header{position:fixed;top:0;box-shadow:0 4px 8px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.08),0 2px 3px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.02);z-index:10}#header-position .nr-common-global-menu{position:fixed;top:56px;left:0;z-index:501}#header-position .nr-common-breakingnews{margin-bottom:-56px;margin-top:56px}@media screen and (max-width:979px){.global-menu-lightbox{margin-top:44px}#header-position .nr-common-global-menu{top:44px}#header-position .nr-common-breakingnews{margin-bottom:-44px;margin-top:44px}}
.series-page .page-header-panel{z-index:2}.series-page .media-contents{margin-bottom:10px}.series-page .tab-bar ul{margin:0 auto;width:1060px}.series-page .main-contents{padding:40px 0}@media screen and (max-width:979px){.series-page .main-contents{padding:0}.series-page .media-contents{padding:20px 8px 0;margin-bottom:0}.series-page .tab-bar ul{width:auto}}
.episode-detail-page{padding-bottom:60px}.episode-detail-page .episode-detailed-memo{width:960px;margin:40px auto 48px}.episode-detail-page .media-contents{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;position:relative;padding:24px 0;margin-bottom:24px;background-color:#1f1f20;background-color:var(--bg-color-dark);border-top:1px solid var(--border-color);border-bottom:1px solid var(--border-color)}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .movie-iframe{width:960px;height:540px}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .contents-image:hover{cursor:pointer}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .contents-image:hover .img-wrapper .img-button+.thumbnail,.episode-detail-page .media-contents .contents-image:hover .img-wrapper a+.thumbnail{opacity:.6}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .extra-thumbnails .thumbnail:hover{opacity:.6;cursor:pointer}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .thumbnail{width:960px;height:540px;z-index:0;box-shadow:none;border-radius:8px}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .thumbnail.playable:after{background-size:10%}.episode-detail-page .media-contents .thumbnail .base-image{position:relative;z-index:1}.episode-detail-page .main-contents{padding:0}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .series-name{margin-bottom:5px;font-size:16px}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .title{font-size:24px;font-weight:700;line-height:1.66667;margin-bottom:15px;line-height:1.25}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .arrow-extra-links{display:flex}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .arrow-extra-links .base-link:first-of-type{order:1}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .arrow-extra-links .base-link:nth-of-type(2){order:3}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .arrow-extra-links .logo{margin:14px 8px 0;height:16px;line-height:16px}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .on-air-info{margin-bottom:20px}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .description .body .text{font-size:16px;line-height:1.5}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .copyrights-list{margin-top:20px}.episode-detail-page .main-contents .main-area>.overview .copyrights-list
